actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to complete work for the protection of Point Chehalis as part of the operation and maintenance of the project of navigation, Grays Harbor and Chehalis River, Washington.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to complete certain work as part of the operation and maintenance for the project for navigation, Grays Harbor and Chehalis River, Washington, as authorized under the River and Harbor Act of 1948.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to complete work for the protection of Point Chehalis as part of the operation and maintenance of the project of navigation, Grays Harbor and Chehalis River, Washington.
